Battle Cards

Scrapper Gauntlets


  1. I have a character with a Reactive Armor. I play a Scrapper Gauntlets on that character. My opponent only has a single Armor in play. What is the timing on the triggers here? Are they considered simultaneous, or does one need to happen before the other?

    They trigger simultaneously and you resolve them in an order of your choosing.

  2. If Thrust has a Grenade Launcher and boosts a character that is attacking, and the opponent reveals a Bolster, to play a Scrapper Gauntlets to scrap the Grenade Launcher, does Thrust donate 7 or 3 attack to the attacking character?

    7 attack. The amount has already been locked in.

  3. If one of my opponent’s characters has a Weapon, can I choose not to scrap it and draw a card?

    No. If there is an enemy Weapon, you must scrap it. You draw a card only if you can’t scrap an enemy Weapon.
